name: Raider Road (Gold Cage Studio)
description:
· Synopsis

Raider Road is a driving game where mental agility and decision making determines your record. Dodge the dangers and turn them into advantages, be a Raider

We plan to update it based on players feedback, so don't forget to comment your opinion !!!

· About us

We are a young Spanish studio composed of three members,
a Programmed, an Artist and a Technical Artist, we have been two years developing games together.

"Gold Cage was born from the need to break the routines and rules of the game"

· Frequent questions

How long is each round?

- Each round usually lasts 2 to 5 minutes

Do you need a powerful computer or mobile?

- You will not have problems with performance, it is very well optimized

How long have you been developing Raider Road?

- We started in October (2019), we have been 3 months
